text: The 2000 All Thailand Golf Tour is the second season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2000 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Men's winner |- | 16 Jan || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|2,000,000 || Prayad Marksaeng |- | 22 Oct || TPC Championships || || align=right|1,000,000 || Boonchu Ruangkit |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2000 All Thailand Golf Tour
